Title: Nasty Skulkers
Intro: Each model in a Nasty Skulkers unit is armed with vicious Back Stabbas.

Rules.Name: Right In Da ’Urty Bitz!
Rules.Rule: Right in da ’Urty Bitz!: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Back Stabba is 6, the target suffers 1 mortal wound and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound roll or save roll).
